description.narrative: This activity (Protection of Basic Services - Phase 2) is a component of Protection of Basic Services Programme - Phase 2 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Sector Budget Support' and a budget of £270,000,000. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Water sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM), Democratic participation and civil society, Road transport, Agricultural policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD). The start date is 01-04-2008 and the end date is 01-04-2012.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
